camera_overhaul_neoforge.config.title: CameraOverhaul Settings
Toggles all of the mod's features.
camera_overhaul_neoforge.config.strafing: Controls the strength of the camera roll rotation caused by strafing, or sideway horizontal velocity.
camera_overhaul_neoforge.config.yawdelta: Controls the strength of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
camera_overhaul_neoforge.config.vertical: Controls the strength of the camera pitch rotation offset caused by vertical velocity.
camera_overhaul_neoforge.config.forwardv: Controls the strength of the camera pitch rotation offset caused by moving forward or backwards.
